abstract: Google Music will sell individual tracks as well as full albums, letting customers store the files in “cloud” accounts. Customers will be allowed to share music by offering friends one free chance to listen to any track purchased through the service.
snippet: Google Music will sell individual tracks as well as full albums, letting customers store the files in “cloud” accounts. Customers will be allowed to share music by offering friends one free chance to listen to any track purchased through the servi...
lead_paragraph: Looking to extend its reach as a hub for entertainment and social networking, Google introduced a set of music features on Wednesday, including a download store to compete with iTunes.

headline.main: Media Decoder: Google Opens a Digital Music Store
